GSD.description:
Revert "mm: kfence: apply kmemleak_ignore_phys on early allocated pool"

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.19.3 by commit daa821e54a74dcfee4f7194fb90faabd2d4ed4a9. For more details please see the references link.
